channel.title: Pages on UKA Code Club
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on UKA Code Club

item.title: UKA Code Club
item.author: rpauli@ukaachen.de (Roman Pauli)
item.description: This Blog is an attempt to document the content of our CodeClub sessions in a transparent and accessible way. It uses the blogdown package to compile several independent .Rmd files into one single Blog. If you’d like your Markdown to be included in the CodeClub HTML documentation: paste your .Rmd to the CodeClubWebsite directory on OneDrive make sure, wd is properly set and all dependencies are correctly defined add a reference to your HTML in _site.
